note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Language
tagline: unicode, database and o/s related issues
body:
### People write all different ways.
The alphabet and other writing constructs are a blessing and a curse in a given situation. 

### The Last of the Phoenicians
I proudly search to improve my Phoenician language skills. Many writing systems that we use today descended directly from this "first alphabet". I hope to one day visit the glorious city name Phoenix (and cheer on their mighty Cardinals and Coyotes).

### an ox named Alf
an ox named Alf found 1!
it must be a gift from the sun.
camel wanted one 2...but it was alf who was blue ;-(
'cause he knew if he lost 1 he'd have none.

### Authors and Contributors
Anything that is considered unprofessional like limericks is courtesy of (@mwest) on GitHub and will likely be removed once he realizes it is just embarrassing.

### Support or Contact
If you are having trouble with databases or operating systems contact language@data.io and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
